articles.content: Previous recessions in the UK since 1700. The green axis on the right shows the UK GDP in millions going by 2013 prices, with the red axis on the left showing the percentage change in GDP (Picture: M… [+3402 chars]

articles.author: Chris Britcher
articles.title: 'I tried Veganuary and stayed on the diet for a year' - Kent Online
articles.description: Last year a KM reporter decided to give Veganuary a go - a year on and he's still on it.
articles.content: Twelve months ago I decided to give Veganuary a go - the annual campaign which last year attracted 400,000 people worldwide to try the diet for the month of January. One year on, and I haven't got of… [+6224 chars]
